events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, and it still hasn’t arrived. The tracking info hasn’t updated in days, and I’m really frustrated about this delay.
The reported issue has been categorized under Delivery Delay due to keywords such as delay, tracking, and late shipment mentioned by the customer.
The case has been assigned to delivery support team agent Sarah M. for further assistance regarding the shipment delay.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m sorry to hear your order is delayed. Let me check the tracking details right now for you.
Could you please provide me your order number or the email address used so I can look into the shipment status more thoroughly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the email used is john.doe@example.com. Please let me know what’s causing the delay.

Thank you for the details. It appears your package was delayed due to a shipping carrier backlog. We expect delivery within 3 more days. We can offer a shipping refund or expedited shipping on your next order.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate the offer for a shipping refund; that sounds fair given the inconvenience.
I have processed a full refund for your shipping costs. You should see it reflected in your account within 3-5 business days. Thank you for your patience.
Just following up to ensure your order was received and the shipping refund processed correctly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Yes, the package arrived yesterday, and I got the refund in my account today. Thank you for the quick resolution and excellent support.
We are glad everything has been resolved to your satisfaction. Closing the case now, and feel free to reach out anytime. Have a great day!
